name: Double Pacman
description:
Double Pacman is a simultaneous 2 players game, with 100 differents levels, and cooperative or competitive modes!

In cooperative mode you simply play with your partner, eating pills, avoiding monster and completing levels.

But ... in competitive mode, you can eat your partner by eating a big pill first!
And, of course your partner can eat you if eat big pill before you!

This game was made in 1994, it was my first videogame, and was developed in Turbo Pascal 5, on a 286 cpu with 1mb Ram.

There are 2 versions to download:

  1.  DosBox Version Installer: This is an installer for new machines (minimal requirements: Windows Vista)
  2.  Zip: this is only the game, only runs in msdos computer (486, pentiums).

Also, you can download source code from https://github.com/moonorongo/doublePalman

 Feel free to download and enjoy!
